query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cleanup_reports` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `runTimestamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `completedAt` TIMESTAMP,
  `duration` INT,
  `status` ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL,
  `mode` ENUM('read_only', 'auto_fix') DEFAULT 'read_only' NOT NULL,
  `criticalIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `warningIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `infoIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `orphanedRecordsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `duplicateRecordsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `staleComputationsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `invalidWeightsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `brokenReferencesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `missingDependenciesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsArchived` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsDeleted` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsFixed` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `calculationsRerun` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `affectedRecords` JSON,
  `recommendations` JSON,
  `errorLog` TEXT,
  `notificationSent` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `notificationSentAt` TIMESTAMP,
  `notificationError` TEXT,
  INDEX `idx_run_timestamp` (`runTimestamp`),
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_mode` (`mode`),
  INDEX `idx_critical_issues` (`criticalIssuesCount`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cleanup_reports` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `runTimestamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `completedAt` TIMESTAMP,
  `duration` INT,
  `status` ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL,
  `mode` ENUM('read_only', 'auto_fix') DEFAULT 'read_only' NOT NULL,
  `criticalIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `warningIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `infoIssuesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `orphanedRecordsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `duplicateRecordsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `staleComputationsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `invalidWeightsCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `brokenReferencesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `missingDependenciesCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsArchived` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsDeleted` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `recordsFixed` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `calculationsRerun` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `affectedRecords` JSON,
  `recommendations` JSON,
  `errorLog` TEXT,
  `notificationSent` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `notificationSentAt` TIMESTAMP,
  `notificationError` TEXT,
  INDEX `idx_run_timestamp` (`runTimestamp`),
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_mode` (`mode`),
  INDEX `idx_critical_issues` (`criticalIssuesCount`)
);
